Our Products

Sodium Lauryl Sulfate

An anionic surfactant used in detergents, shampoos, and toothpastes.

Sodium Alpha-olefin Sulfonate

A mild, biodegradable surfactant often used in personal care products.

Sodium Dodccyl Sulfate

Commonly used for its foaming and cleaning properties in cosmetics and cleaners.

High Activity Color Stain Remover

Powerful stain remover stick ideal for colored fabrics and tough stains.

Gypsum Board Foaming Agent

Used to produce lightweight gypsum boards with uniform pore structure.

Potassium Dodecyl Sulfate

A potassium salt of dodecyl sulfate used in cleaning and emulsification.

Lithium Dodecyl Sulfate

Specialty surfactant with niche industrial and research applications.

Magnesium Dodecyl Sulfate

Magnesium-based surfactant used in specialized cleaning formulations.

Sodium N-Decyl Sulfate

Used in industrial applications as a wetting and dispersing agent.

Sodium Octyl Decyl Alcohol Sulphate

Surfactant derived from mixed alcohols, used in cleaning and personal care.

Positive Octyl Sodium Sulfate

An effective emulsifier and foaming agent used in detergents.

Sodium Isooctanol Sulfate

Branched alcohol-based sulfate used in mild cleansing products.
